channel.title: CVE Feed for WPS -- WPS Office
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPS -- WPS Office

item.title: CVE-2021-40399|2024-08-04T02:44:09.455Z -- wps -- wps%20office
item.description: An exploitable use-after-free vulnerability exists in WPS Spreadsheets ( ET ) as part of WPS Office, version 11.2.0.10351. A specially-crafted XLS file can cause a use-after-free condition, resulting in remote code execution. An attacker needs to provide a malformed file to the victim to trigger the vulnerability.
